translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

With your letter of the 8th of the current month, the 390 horses arrived that Your Lordship Fidêncio Machado, who performed this commission splendidly, for said horses arrived very well treated. Your Lordship

God keep Your Lordship Secretariat of Finance in Piratini, January 10, 1839. Domingos José de Almeida

Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira. Commander of the Right Division.
